column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Came here while in town for business. My colleague and I ordered the Filet Mignon
column2: which was well worth the money. Bone Marrow and crab cake to start
column3: which were both excellent. Cocktails were delicious and the service was on point. Came in around 9 without a reservation on a Tuesday and sat at a high top table. Seemed to be a hot spot in the area. Will be back next time I am in town!
